REPORT.name: Трафик по тарифам
REPORT.description: Name: Отчет по трафику, показывает объем в МБ по тарифам за указанный интервал времени Author: NodaSoft E-mail: support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code:
if object_id('tempdb..#ttt') is not null DROP TABLE #ttt
CREATE TABLE #ttt ( [id] [int] IDENTITY (1, 1) NOT NULL , [name] [varchar] (50) COLLATE Cyrillic_General_CI_AS NULL , [traffic] numeric(12,2) ) ON [PRIMARY]
insert into #ttt (name, traffic) select TR.[name] as [Тариф], CAST(sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024/1024 as numeric(12,2)) as [Трафик] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (Sessions.id = SessionsAdd.idSessions) inner join (select id, name from Tarifs UNION ALL select 0 id, 'Ремонт' name) TR on (SessionsAdd.idTarif = TR.id) where (SessionsAdd.[Start] >= %TIME-START%) and (SessionsAdd.[Stop] <= %TIME-STOP%)
group by TR.[name]
insert into #ttt (name, traffic) values ('------',0)
insert into #ttt (name, traffic) select 'Итого:', CAST(sum(SessionsAdd.Traffic)/1024/1024 as numeric(12,2)) as [Трафик] from Sessions inner join SessionsAdd on (Sessions.id = SessionsAdd.idSessions) where (SessionsAdd.[Start] >= %TIME-START%) and (SessionsAdd.[Stop] <= %TIME-STOP%) select name [Тариф], traffic [Трафик в МБ] from #ttt order by id
